name: Hex Uploader
tagline: A simple Mac app for loading hex files onto Arduino boards
body:
A simple GUI that lets Mac users easily load hex files (like GRBL) onto their Arduino.

![Screenshot of Hex Uploader](http://i.imgur.com/TU7CBVp.png)

A standard installation of the Arduino IDE _is required_ to `/Applications/Arduino.app`.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
